metadata.title: RA Family: How many language can this solution with Cyberon support ?

sections.content:
Question:
How many language can this solution with Cyberon support ?
Answer:
This solution supports +44 language worldwide.
Suitable Products
MCU : RA4E1 or RA6E1
LDO : RAA214220
Op-Amp : READ2302G
QSPI : AT25SF641B
